[Lightning Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=6418) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=265), [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6414); Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

You can rig a trap with incredible speed. When you create a [snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) that normally takes 1 minute to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385), you can Craft it using a single Interact action instead.
